Mercury::PacketMonitor

Mercury::PacketMonitor Class Reference
[Mercury]

This class defines an interface that can be used to receive a callback whenever an incoming or outgoing packet passes through Mercury. More...

#include <packet_monitor.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual ~PacketMonitor ()
virtual void packetOut (const Address &addr, const Packet &packet)=0
 This method is called when Mercury sends a packet.
virtual void packetIn (const Address &addr, const Packet &packet)=0
 This method is called when Mercury receives a packet, before it is processed.

Detailed Description

This class defines an interface that can be used to receive a callback whenever an incoming or outgoing packet passes through Mercury.

See also:
NetworkInterface::setPacketMonitor

const Packet &  packet

This method is called when Mercury sends a packet.
